about_the_game:
Terrain3D - Create Custom 3D Printable Tabletop Terrains and Structures

Terrain3D is an intuitive 3D modeling tool designed specifically for crafting custom terrains and structures for tabletop games. Whether you're designing sprawling landscapes, immersive dungeons, or unique buildings, Terrain3D empowers you to create, customize, and bring your visions to life with 3D printing.

Built with tabletop gaming enthusiasts and professionals in mind, Terrain3D simplifies the process of designing and exporting STL files for your 3D printer. With its user-friendly interface and tools, even beginners can craft environments that add depth and excitement to any gaming session without having to learn complicated 3D software or paying someone a lot of money to make a custom piece.

My Vision for Terrain3D

I'm committed to expanding the library of buildable pieces, allowing users to seamlessly integrate features like water bodies, forests, modular buildings, and detailed landscapes. From immersive battlefields to vibrant towns, Terrain3D provides the flexibility to design worlds limited only by your imagination.

Key Features:

  • Tailored for designing terrains and structures for tabletop games.

  • Easy STL file export for seamless 3D printing.

  • Perfect for creating dungeons, villages, landscapes, and more.

  • Accessible for beginners yet powerful for professionals who sell their 3D Printed creations.

Transform your tabletop experience with custom terrains and structures made with Terrain3D! Unleash your creativity today.

Be sure to check out the FAQ's on the website and/or in Discord!
detailed_description:
T3D Official Discord Now Live

I am thrilled to announce that the Terrain3D (T3D) Discord server is officially open to the public! Whether you're a tabletop gaming enthusiast, a 3D printing aficionado, or just curious about Terrain3D, this is the place for you!

Connect with other creators, share your designs, get exclusive tips, and provide feedback to shape the future of T3D. Plus, stay updated on the latest features, updates, and events!

Join us using the Discord button on the right side of this page!

I can’t wait to see the incredible terrains and structures you’ll bring to life. Let’s forge the future of tabletop gaming together!
